verses.verse: And they took their journey <WH5265> from Elim <WH362>, and all the congregation <WH5712> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> came <WH935> unto the wilderness <WH4057> of Sin <WH5512>, which is between Elim <WH362> and Sinai <WH5514>, on the fifteenth <WH2568> day <WH3117> of the second <WH8145> month <WH2320> after their departing out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And the whole congregation <WH5712> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> murmured <WH3885> against Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> in the wilderness <WH4057>:

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> said <WH559> unto them <WH4310>, Would to God we had died <WH4191> by the hand <WH3027> of the Lord <WH3068> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, when we sat <WH3427> by the flesh <WH1320> pots <WH5518>, and when we did eat <WH398> bread <WH3899> to the full <WH7648>; for you have brought us forth <WH3318> into this wilderness <WH4057>, to kill <WH4191> this whole assembly <WH6951> with hunger <WH7458>.

Then said <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> unto Moses <WH4872>, Behold <WH4305>, I will rain bread <WH3899> from heaven <WH8064> for you <WH5971>; and the people shall go out <WH3318> and gather <WH3950> a certain rate <WH1697> every day <WH3117>, that I may prove <WH5254> them <WH3212>, whether they will walk in my law <WH8451>, or not.

And it shall come to pass <WH8345>, that on the sixth day <WH3117> they shall prepare <WH3559> that which <WH834> they bring in <WH935>; and it shall be twice <WH4932> as much as they gather <WH3950> daily <WH3117>.

And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> said <WH559> unto all the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, At even <WH6153>, then you shall know <WH3045> that the Lord <WH3068> has brought you out <WH3318> from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>:

And in the morning <WH1242>, then you shall see <WH7200> the glory <WH3519> of the Lord <WH3068>; for that he hears <WH8085> your murmurings <WH8519> against the Lord <WH3068>: and what are we <WH5168>, that you murmur against us <WH3885>?

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559>, This shall be <WH3068>, when the Lord shall give <WH5414> you in the evening <WH6153> flesh <WH1320> to eat <WH398>, and in the morning <WH1242> bread <WH3899> to the full <WH7646>; for that the Lord <WH3068> hears <WH8085> your murmurings <WH8519> which you murmur <WH3885> against him <WH5168>: and what are we? Your murmurings <WH8519> are not against us <WH3068>, but against the Lord.

And Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH559> unto Aaron <WH175>, Say <WH559> unto all the congregation <WH5712> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, Come near <WH7126> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>: for he has heard <WH8085> your murmurings <WH8519>.

And it came to pass <WH175>, as Aaron spoke <WH1696> unto the whole congregation <WH5712> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that they looked <WH6437> toward the wilderness <WH4057>, and <WH3519>, behold, the glory of the Lord <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> in the cloud <WH6051>.
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

I have heard <WH8085> the murmurings <WH8519> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: speak <WH1696> unto them <WH559>, saying, At even <WH996> you shall eat <WH398> flesh <WH1320>, and in the morning <WH1242> you shall be filled <WH7646> with bread <WH3899>; and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>.

And it came to pass <WH6153>, that at even the quails <WH7958> came up <WH5927>, and covered <WH3680> the camp <WH4264>: and in the morning <WH1242> the dew <WH2919> lay <WH7902> round about <WH5439> the host <WH4264>.

And when the dew <WH2919> that lay <WH7902> was gone up <WH5927>, behold <WH6440>, upon the face of the wilderness <WH4057> there lay a small <WH1851> round thing <WH2636>, as small <WH1851> as the hoar frost <WH3713> on the ground <WH776>.

And when the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> saw <WH7200> it <WH559>, they said one <WH376> to another <WH251>, It is manna <WH4478>: for they knew <WH3045> not what it was <WH4872>. And Moses said <WH559> unto them <WH3899>, This is the bread which the Lord <WH3068> has given <WH5414> you to eat <WH402>.

This is the thing <WH1697> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> has commanded <WH6680>, Gather <WH3950> of it every man <WH376> according <WH6310> to his eating <WH400>, an omer <WH6016> for every man <WH1538>, according to the number <WH4557> of your persons <WH5315>; take <WH3947> you every man <WH376> for them which are in his tents <WH168>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> so <WH3950>, and gathered, some more <WH7235>, some less <WH4591>.

And when they did measure <WH4058> it with an omer <WH6016>, he that gathered much <WH7235> had nothing over <WH5736>, and he that gathered little <WH4591> had no lack <WH2637>; they gathered <WH3950> every man <WH376> according <WH6310> to his eating <WH400>.
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559>, Let no man <WH376> leave <WH3498> of it until the morning <WH1242>.

Nevertheless they listened <WH8085> not unto Moses <WH4872>; but some <WH582> of them left <WH3498> of it until the morning <WH1242>, and it bred <WH7311> worms <WH8438>, and stank <WH887>: and Moses <WH4872> was angry with them <WH7107>.
And they gathered <WH3950> it every morning <WH1242>, every man <WH376> according <WH6310> to his eating <WH400>: and when the sun <WH8121> grew hot <WH2552>, it melted <WH4549>.

And it came to pass <WH8345>, that on the sixth day <WH3117> they gathered <WH3950> twice <WH4932> as much bread <WH3899>, two <WH8147> omers <WH6016> for one <WH259> man <WH5387>: and all the rulers of the congregation <WH5712> came <WH935> and told <WH5046> Moses <WH4872>.

And he said <WH559> unto them <WH3068>, This is that which the Lord has said <WH1696>, To morrow <WH4279> is the rest <WH7677> of the holy <WH6944> sabbath <WH7676> unto the Lord <WH3068>: bake <WH644> that which you will bake <WH644> to day <WH1310>, and boil that you will boil <WH1310>; and that which <WH3605> remains over <WH5736> lay up <WH3240> for you to be kept <WH4931> until the morning <WH1242>.
And they laid it up <WH3240> until the morning <WH1242>, as Moses <WH4872> told <WH6680>: and it did not stink <WH887>, neither was there any worm in it <WH7415>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559>, Eat <WH398> that to day <WH3117>; for to day <WH3117> is a sabbath <WH7676> unto the Lord <WH3068>: to day <WH3117> you shall not find <WH4672> it in the field <WH7704>.
Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> you shall gather <WH3950> it <WH7637>; but on the seventh day <WH3117>, which is the sabbath <WH7676>, in it there shall be none.
And it came to pass <WH3318>, that there went out some of the people <WH5971> on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> for to gather <WH3950>, and they found none <WH4672>.
And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, How long refuse <WH3985> you to keep <WH8104> my commandments <WH4687> and my laws <WH8451>?

See <WH7200>, for that the Lord <WH3068> has given <WH5414> you the sabbath <WH7676>, therefore he gives <WH5414> you on the sixth <WH8345> day <WH3117> the bread <WH3899> of two days <WH3117>; stay <WH3427> you every man <WH376> in his place <WH376>, let no man go out <WH3318> of his place <WH4725> on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>.
So the people <WH5971> rested <WH7673> on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>.

And the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> there Manna <WH4478>: and it was like coriander <WH1407> seed <WH2233>, white <WH3836>; and the taste <WH2940> of it was like wafers <WH6838> made with honey <WH1706>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559>, This is the thing <WH1697> which the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680>, Fill <WH4393> an omer <WH6016> of it to be kept <WH4931> for your generations <WH1755>; that they may see <WH7200> the bread <WH3899> with which I have fed <WH398> you in the wilderness <WH4057>, when I brought you forth <WH3318> from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Aaron <WH175>, Take <WH3947> a <WH259> pot <WH6803>, and put <WH5414> an omer <WH6016> full <WH4393> of manna <WH4478> in it and lay it up <WH3240> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>, to be kept <WH4931> for your generations <WH1755>.
As the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>, so Aaron <WH175> laid it up <WH3240> before <WH6440> the Testimony <WH5715>, to be kept <WH4931>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did eat <WH398> manna <WH4478> forty <WH705> years <WH8141>, until they came <WH935> to a land <WH776> inhabited <WH3427>; they did eat <WH398> manna <WH4478>, until they came <WH935> unto the borders <WH7097> of the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>.
Now an omer <WH6016> is the tenth <WH6224> part of an ephah <WH374>.
